api_list.name: Resort View
api_list.description: View the information of a resort
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ski-resorts-and-conditions.p.rapidapi.com/v1/resort/whistler-blackcomb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ski-resorts-and-conditions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
